Russian security forces battle militants in Ingushetia region, Russian media reportRussian security forces fought alleged militants all night in Russia's North Caucasus republic of Ingushetia, Russian state media reported on Sunday morning, leading authorities to introduce counter-terrorism emergency powers in the area. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 06:57:22 GMT SQ33OSHMLZOBBGFBDYVY36K24A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-security-forces-battle-militant-ingushetia-region- Russian-media-report-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
China's embassy condemns Philippine envoy's remarks on South China SeaChina's embassy in the Philippines on Sunday said it "strongly" condemns the Philippine ambassador to Washington's recent China-related remarks, saying they "disregarded basic facts". Sun, 03 Mar 2024 06:27:38 GMT C54O5U5OJFIJLD6XHXWBUGD5PE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-embassy-condemns-philippine-envoys-remarks-south-china-sea-2024-03-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Norway's King Harald on his way home from MalaysiaNorway's King Harald was discharged from a Malaysian hospital on Sunday and was flying home on a medical evacuation plane after receiving treatment for an infection and receiving a temporary pacemaker. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 05:47:24 GMT ZB3NFPD3IJM65IXS44ILQRJ7TY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/norways-king-harald-on-his-way-home-malaysia-media-reports-say-2024-03-03/Ahmad Luqman Ismail, Gwladys Fouche世界欧洲
Pakistan's Shehbaz Sharif set to take oath as prime minister for second termPakistani politician Shehbaz Sharif was set on Sunday to become prime minister for the second time in a vote by the country's newly formed parliament, three weeks after uncertain national elections led to the formation of a coalition government. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 05:12:20 GMT QQHAR2Z2RRPGBLZHQWQRADYBBY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-shehbaz-sharif-set-to-take-oath-as-prime-second-term-2024-03-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia says Ukraine attacked Crimea with 38 dronesRussian air defence systems destroyed all 38 drones that Ukraine launched at the Crimean Peninsula early on Sunday, Russia's defence ministry said, after reports on Ukrainian and Russian social media of powerful explosions in the port of Feodosia. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 03:38:46 GMT ZODQUMSRFFLFFLYJXYYDTURTEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-ukraine-attacked-crimea-with-38-drones-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Haitian police unions plead for help after attack on main prisonArmed groups were closing in on Haiti's largest prison on Saturday night, defying police forces who called for help after days of gunfire in parts of the capital as a major gang leader seeks to topple Prime Minister Ariel Henry. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 02:53:39 GMT BH35BNB2RJL25E5I5MTJ267HDY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitian-police-unions-plead-help-after-attack-main-prison-2024-03-03/Reuters世界美洲
Canada, Italy leaders cancel Toronto event for security reasonsCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni on Saturday canceled a joint visit to the Art Gallery of Ontario in Toronto for security reasons, according to a Canadian spokesperson. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 01:59:01 GMT HUR65CZUGFM6BJK6CXZWPJ57N4 https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-italy-leaders-cancel-toronto-event-for-security-reasons-2024-03-03/Carlos Osorio世界
Gaza truce talks expected as offensive and aid crisis rage onIsraeli and Hamas delegations were expected to arrive in Cairo on Sunday, though a source briefed on the talks said Israel would not send a delegation until it got a full list of hostages who are still alive. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 01:13:59 GMT NPZFSNEETZPEFHJ3LTL3SMZPXU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/talks-gaza-truce-expected-offective-aid-crisis-rage-2024-03-03/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Government candidate wins Australia by-election amid cost-of-living squeezeA candidate from Australia's government claimed victory late on Saturday in a by-election in Victoria state seen as a referendum on Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's handling of cost-of-living pressures across the country. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 23:39:02 GMT SIXQC3FK45P75AZBWFOQALLHA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/government-candidate-wins-australia-by-election-amid-cost-of-living-squeeze-2024-03-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Moscow says Russia, China agree that Russia must be present in Ukraine talksRussian Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Galuzin and China's special representative for Eurasian affairs, Li Hui, said it is impossible to discuss a Ukraine settlement without Moscow's participation, the Russian foreign ministry said on Sunday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 22:49:57 GMT DMSJEDODCFLJZJJUGZJ5D2NLB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/moscow-says-Russia-china-agree-that-Russia-must-be-present-ukraine-talks-2024-03-02/Reuters世界
Russia says it destroyed two Ukrainian dronesRussia's defence ministry said its air defences destroyed a Ukrainian unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), or drone, over Leningrad region, which borders the Gulf of Finland, and a second one in Belgorod region on Saturday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 19:55:10 GMT Y4U4EMZ36FI7FLR2VPJLPCCAUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-destroyed-two-ukrainian-drones-2024-03-02/Reuters世界欧洲
